Pre open Nifty data

Source: R/nse-preopen.R
preopen_nifty.Rd

Fetch data of pre open session of Nifty & Nifty Bank.

nse_preopen_nifty()

nse_preopen_nifty_bank()

Value

A tibble with the following columns:

symbolNSE ticker. seriesEquity (EQ) corp_action_dateCorporate action date. corp_actionCorporate Action pricePrice changeChange in price percent_changePercentage change in price. prev_closePrevious close. quantityQuantity valueValue (in lakhs), mkt_capFree float market capitalization (in crores). year_highNormal market 52 week high. year_lowNormal market 52 week low.

Examples

# \donttest{
nse_preopen_nifty()
#> # A tibble: 50 x 13
#>    symbol series corp_action_date corp_action price change percent_change
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>       <dbl>  <dbl>          <dbl>
#>  1 M&M    EQ     NA               NA           525   -5.55          -1.05
#>  2 BHART~ EQ     NA               NA           471.  28.7            6.49
#>  3 RELIA~ EQ     NA               NA          1600   48.8            3.15
#>  4 GRASIM EQ     NA               NA           810   23.0            2.92
#>  5 INFRA~ EQ     NA               NA           284.   8              2.9 
#>  6 JSWST~ EQ     NA               NA           268.   5.95           2.27
#>  7 UPL    EQ     NA               NA           583.   9.7            1.69
#>  8 INDUS~ EQ     NA               NA          1592   22.9            1.46
#>  9 GAIL   EQ     NA               NA           128.   1.8            1.43
#> 10 YESBA~ EQ     NA               NA            69    0.7            1.02
#> # ... with 40 more rows, and 6 more variables: prev_close <dbl>,
#> #   quantity <dbl>, value <dbl>, mkt_cap <dbl>, year_high <dbl>, year_low <dbl>
nse_preopen_nifty_bank()
#> # A tibble: 12 x 13
#>    symbol series corp_action_date corp_action  price change percent_change
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>        <dbl>  <dbl>          <dbl>

#>  2 YESBA~ EQ     NA               NA            69     0.7            1.02
#>  3 RBLBA~ EQ     NA               NA           373.   -1.2           -0.32
#>  4 HDFCB~ EQ     2019-09-19       FACE VALUE~ 1274.   -1             -0.08
#>  5 KOTAK~ EQ     NA               NA          1614.   -0.7           -0.04
#>  6 SBIN   EQ     NA               NA           344.    2.05           0.6 
#>  7 IDFCF~ EQ     NA               NA            47     0.15           0.32
#>  8 ICICI~ EQ     NA               NA           513.    0.85           0.17
#>  9 BANKB~ EQ     NA               NA           105     0.1            0.1

# }
